data.meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.
data.sentence: The word اللَّهِ comes from the root ا ل ه and is associated with the meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.

data.meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.
data.sentence: The word اللَّهَ comes from the root ا ل ه and is associated with the meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.

data.meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.
data.sentence: The word فِي comes from the root ف ي and is associated with the meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.

data.meanings: To surpass in number or quantity, increase, multiply, happen often; To be much, many, numerous.
data.sentence: The word كَثِيرًا comes from the root ك ث ر and is associated with the meanings: To surpass in number or quantity, increase, multiply, happen often; To be much, many, numerous.

data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
data.sentence: The word كَانَ comes from the root ك و ن and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
The word لِمَنْ comes from the root م ن and is associated with the meanings: From

data.meanings: To be handsome, make good, seem good or beautiful, be excellent.
data.sentence: The word حَسَنَةٌ comes from the root ح س ن and is associated with the meanings: To be handsome, make good, seem good or beautiful, be excellent.
The word لَقَدْ comes from the root ق د and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to send a messenger, bestow, let go. rasul (pl. rusul) - envoy, bearer of a message, messenger. risalat - message, commission, mission, epistle. arsala (vb. 4) - to send. mursalat (pl. of mursalatun) - those sent forth.
data.sentence: The word رَسُولِ comes from the root ر س ل and is associated with the meanings: to send a messenger, bestow, let go. rasul (pl. rusul) - envoy, bearer of a message, messenger. risalat - message, commission, mission, epistle. arsala (vb. 4) - to send. mursalat (pl. of mursalatun) - those sent forth.

data.meanings: to hope/expect, an opinion requiring the happening of an event in which will be a cause of happiness; expectation of deriving advantage from an event of which a cause has already occurred, keep awaited, put off, put aside, defer/delay, fear, beg/request. arja' (pl.) - borders, sides. marjowwon is a person in whom great hopes are placed (e.g. 11:62).
data.sentence: The word يَرْجُوا comes from the root ر ج و and is associated with the meanings: to hope/expect, an opinion requiring the happening of an event in which will be a cause of happiness; expectation of deriving advantage from an event of which a cause has already occurred, keep awaited, put off, put aside, defer/delay, fear, beg/request. arja' (pl.) - borders, sides. marjowwon is a person in whom great hopes are placed (e.g. 11:62).

data.meanings: go backwards, retreat/recede/retire, hold back/delay/postpone/defer, last/back part of a thing .Another, other, 2nd.
data.sentence: The word الْءَاخِرَ comes from the root ا خ ر and is associated with the meanings: go backwards, retreat/recede/retire, hold back/delay/postpone/defer, last/back part of a thing .Another, other, 2nd.
The word أُسْوَةٌ comes from the root ا س ي and is associated with the meanings: to be sad, solicitous, afflicted (with 'alaa).

data.meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.
data.sentence: The word وَالْيَوْمَ comes from the root ي و م and is associated with the meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.

data.meanings: to remember/commemorate/recollect, study in order to remember, remind, bear in mind, mindful, mention/tell/relate, magnify/praise, admonish/warn (e.g. dhikra is the 2nd declenation and it is stronger than dhikr), preach, extol, give status.nobility/eminence/honour, fame, good report, cause of good reputation, means of exaltation.Male/man/masculine (dhakar, dual - dhakarain, plural - dhukur).
data.sentence: The word وَذَكَرَ comes from the root ذ ك ر and is associated with the meanings: to remember/commemorate/recollect, study in order to remember, remind, bear in mind, mindful, mention/tell/relate, magnify/praise, admonish/warn (e.g. dhikra is the 2nd declenation and it is stronger than dhikr), preach, extol, give status.nobility/eminence/honour, fame, good report, cause of good reputation, means of exaltation.Male/man/masculine (dhakar, dual - dhakarain, plural - dhukur).
